title: Drive: Managing the Versions of a File
body:
Drive: Managing the Versions of a File¶

Manage Versions keeps a record of all versions of a file. When you upload a new version as detailed below, this file version will be displayed.
However, you will still be able view previous versions of the file and revert to one of these versions.
To manage the versions of a file, you must have navigated to the desired file. Refer to Managing a File or Folder if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Click Manage Versions in the info tab

    • Alternatively, click to access this option

  2. If desired, click Upload New Version and select a file

  3. Click View file in another window to pull up the file in the Maha Drive in a separate tab

  4. Click and Yes to revert to this version of the file

  5. Click Done
